name: Diamond Miner - Funny Game
description:
Do you like playing arcade games and classic diamond mine games? If you do, the brand new and addictive diamond gold miner game is ready for you! Participate in this funny games and have fun like never before! Use the claw to reel in the diamonds, collect them all before the time runs out and be the best diamond digger ever!

Diamonds, gold and dynamite? Sounds great, right? So wait no more. Feel some gold rush experience. Go get them. Your claw will swing forward and backward. Tap screen to lower it. When it catches something it will reel it up. You will have a chance to dig some great diamonds and gold. Heavy rocks and big diamonds will be harder to reel up. Between levels you have a chance to get some rewards that can help you digging for gold and diamonds.

Download on GooglePlay: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.toyguns.goldminer
